commands.name: az maps account create
commands.summary: Create a Maps Account. A Maps Account holds the keys which allow access to the Maps REST APIs.
commands.syntax:
az maps account create --account-name
                       --resource-group
                       --sku {G2, S0, S1}
                       [--accept-tos]
                       [--disable-local-auth {false, true}]
                       [--kind {Gen1, Gen2}]
                       [--linked-resources]
                       [--tags]
                       [--type {None, SystemAssigned, SystemAssigned, UserAssigned, UserAssigned}]
                       [--user-identities]
examples: az maps account create --type "SystemAssigned, UserAssigned" --user-identities "{\"/subscriptions/21a9967a-e8a9-4656-a70b-96ff1c4d05a0/resourceGroups/myResourceGroup/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/identityName\":{}}" --kind "Gen2" --disable-local-auth false --linked-resources id="/subscriptions/21a9967a-e8a9-4656-a70b-96ff1c4d05a0/resourceGroups/myResourceGroup/providers/Microsoft.Storage/accounts/mystorageacc" unique-name="myBatchStorageAccount" --linked-resources id="/subscriptions/21a9967a-e8a9-4656-a70b-96ff1c4d05a0/resourceGroups/myResourceGroup/providers/Microsoft.Storage/accounts/mystorageacc" unique-name="myBlobDataSource" --tags test="true" --account-name "myMapsAccount" --resource-group "myResourceGroup" --sku "S0"
az maps account create --kind "Gen1" --disable-local-auth false --tags test="true" --account-name "myMapsAccount" --resource-group "myResourceGroup" --sku "S0"
az maps account create --kind "Gen2" --disable-local-auth true --tags test="true" --account-name "myMapsAccount" --resource-group "myResourceGroup" --sku "S0"

commands.name: az maps account list
commands.summary: Show all maps accounts in a subscription or in a resource group.

commands.name: az maps account show
commands.summary: Show the details of a maps account.
examples: az maps account show --name MyMapsAccount --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az maps account update
commands.summary: Updates a Maps Account. Only a subset of the parameters may be updated after creation, such as Sku, Tags, Properties.
commands.syntax:
az maps account update --sku {G2, S0, S1}
                       [--account-name]
                       [--disable-local-auth {false, true}]
                       [--ids]
                       [--kind {Gen1, Gen2}]
                       [--linked-resources]
                       [--resource-group]
                       [--subscription]
                       [--tags]
                       [--type {None, SystemAssigned, SystemAssigned, UserAssigned, UserAssigned}]
                       [--user-identities]
examples: az maps account update --type "SystemAssigned, UserAssigned" --user-identities "{\"/subscriptions/21a9967a-e8a9-4656-a70b-96ff1c4d05a0/resourceGroups/myResourceGroup/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/identityName\":{}}" --kind "Gen2" --linked-resources id="/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Storage/accounts/{storageName}" unique-name="myBatchStorageAccount" --account-name "myMapsAccount" --resource-group "myResourceGroup" --sku "S1"
